meanings.definition: A disease caused by inhaling the spores of a fungus called Histoplasma capsulatum.
meanings.sent1: Histoplasmoses can affect the lungs and cause flu-like symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the patient with histoplasmoses after conducting tests.
meanings.sent3: The histoplasmoses outbreak in the town led to many people seeking medical help.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, histoplasmoses spread like wildfire among the animals.
meanings.sent5: The dangers of histoplasmoses became evident as more cases were reported.
